nodes.text: The SE-44 was a blaster pistol wielded by some officers of the First Order. It was a variant of the SE-44C blaster pistol and was utilized during the regime's war against the Resistance.

The SE-44 first appeared in the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II, created by Electronic Arts. In-game, it serves as the default primary weapon of the "Officer" class when playing on the side of the First Order.
